title: Thresh Bug
body: In the recommended build for Thresh "Aggressive" is spelt "agressive"

replies.body: You see i thought you were talking about his relevant bug where the store classifies him as a melee champion therefore preventing him from purchasing hurricane.

I had a complaint similar to this but that was because at the bottom of every recommended page there wasn't an consumables so I asked a riot member directly to fix it and they did.(well at lest with the champions I have seen.)
